verses.roman:
ucca kari' kare sabe nāma-saṅkīrtana
tṛtīya prahare haila prabhura cetana

synonyms: ucca—very loudly; kari'-doing; kare—began; sabe—all; nāma-saṅkīrtana—chanting of the Hare Kṛṣṇa mahā-mantra; tṛtīya prahare—in the forenoon; haila—there was; prabhura—of Lord Caitanya; cetana—consciousness.
translation: All of the devotees then began to loudly chant the Hare Kṛṣṇa mantra. Just before noon the Lord regained His consciousness.
